// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Type                         | Definition
// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// dlight (directional light)   | <position> <color>
// plight (point light)         | <position> <radius> <color>
// wall                         | <position> <plane> <texture>
// obj                          | <position> <scale> <normal> <filename> <texture>
// gdkgeo                       | <position> <scale> <normal> <filename> <texture>
// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Value definitions
// <position>    | x y z
// <color>       | r g b
// <radius>      | r
// <texture>     | texture name, assumed to be in the proper assets root location
// <normal>      | see <position>
// <plane>       | <width> <height> <normal>
// <scale>       | x y z
// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
dlight -1.0 -1.0 0.5 0.5 0.5 0.5
dlight  1.0 -1.0 0.5 0.5 0.4 0.3
dlight 0.0 1.0 -0.5 0.3 0.4 0.5

// floor
wall 256.0 0.0 256.0 512.0 512.0 0.0 1.0 0.0 wall1.jpg

// ceiling
wall 256.0 8.0 256.0 512.0 512.0 0.0 -1.0 0.0 wall1.jpg
